entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , North Bay
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:12 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -31.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: North Bay Airport 02:00 AM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -31.9°C
Pressure: 103.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Wind Chill: -40
Dewpoint: -36.1°C
Wind: WSW 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 36.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 42 this evening. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 in the evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:31 PM EST Friday 03 February 2023
